attributes.action: get the NHS to create a drug for celebrity worship syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have CWS and i'm getting fed up with it. I'm fed up with thinking about a certain celebrity all the time. Please can you get the NHS to develop a drug for CWS so that i can get my life back. To be honest i wish i never watched a certain TV show because of it. Please sign this if you have CWS and are fed up of the effects it has on you and would like to be free of it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
